events.name: Latina Leadership Summit 2023
events.description: The Latina Leadership Summit is our flagship three-day immersive experience designed to transform your leadership potential. Join hundreds of ambitious Latinas for powerful keynotes, interactive workshops, and life-changing connections. You'll leave with clarity on your vision, strategies to overcome limiting beliefs, and a supportive network of like-minded women. The summit includes all workshop materials, healthy meals and refreshments, and access to our exclusive networking events.
events.shortDescription: Three days of transformational workshops, networking, and inspiration for ambitious Latinas.

events.name: Entrepreneurship Intensive
events.description: The Entrepreneurship Intensive is a two-day bootcamp focused on giving Latina entrepreneurs the tools, knowledge, and connections they need to build successful businesses. From developing your business model to securing funding and scaling operations, our expert facilitators will guide you through every aspect of the entrepreneurial journey. This hands-on program includes interactive exercises, one-on-one coaching sessions, and opportunities to pitch your business to successful Latina founders for feedback.
events.shortDescription: Master the fundamentals of building your own business with expert coaching and peer support.

events.name: Personal Branding Masterclass
events.description: In this intensive one-day masterclass, you'll learn how to build and leverage your personal brand to advance your career and open new opportunities. Our expert facilitators will guide you through defining your unique value proposition, crafting your story, building your online presence, and strategically networking to amplify your impact. You'll leave with a clear personal branding strategy, professionally shot headshots, and a toolkit of resources to implement what you've learned.
events.shortDescription: Learn to build and leverage your personal brand to advance your career and create new opportunities.

events.name: Latina Empire Wellness & Wealth Retreat
events.description:
Join us for a transformational four-day retreat that will rejuvenate your health and build your wealth at the stunning beaches of Tulum. The Latina Empire Wellness & Wealth Retreat combines holistic wellness practices with powerful wealth-building strategies designed specifically for ambitious Latina professionals. 

Each day features expert-led workshops on financial investment, morning yoga and meditation sessions, masterclasses on entrepreneurship, healthy cooking demonstrations featuring authentic Latin cuisine, and evening networking events with successful Latina business leaders. 

You'll leave with a personalized wellness plan, concrete financial strategies, and a supportive network of like-minded Latina professionals who are committed to mutual success. This all-inclusive luxury experience includes premium oceanfront accommodations, organic farm-to-table meals, and all workshop materials.
events.shortDescription: A transformational retreat where you'll rejuvenate your health and build your wealth in a tropical paradise.
events.locationAddress: Carretera Tulum-Boca Paila Km 7, Tulum, Q.R., Mexico

events.name: Latinas in Tech Summit
events.description: The Latinas in Tech Summit brings together Latina professionals, entrepreneurs, and students in the technology sector for two days of learning, networking, and inspiration. The event features keynote speeches from leading Latina tech executives, panel discussions on emerging technologies and career advancement, hands-on workshops in coding and digital skills, and exclusive networking opportunities with recruiters from top tech companies. Participants will gain valuable skills, expand their professional network, and be inspired by the stories and achievements of successful Latinas in the tech industry.
events.shortDescription: Connect with leading Latina tech professionals and advance your career in the technology sector.

events.name: Latina Empire Leadership Conference
events.description: Our annual flagship leadership conference brings together ambitious Latinas from across the country for three days of transformational learning, networking, and inspiration. The conference features world-class speakers, interactive workshops, panel discussions, and curated networking opportunities. You'll develop critical leadership skills, explore strategies for overcoming cultural and gender barriers, connect with mentors and peers, and leave with an actionable plan for advancing your career or business. The conference includes all sessions, workshop materials, meals, and exclusive networking events.
events.shortDescription: Our flagship annual conference featuring world-class speakers and transformational workshops for Latina leaders.

events.name: Financial Empowerment Workshop
events.description: Take control of your financial future with our comprehensive Financial Empowerment Workshop designed specifically for Latina professionals. This virtual event covers essential financial literacy topics including budgeting, investing, retirement planning, and building generational wealth. Our expert financial advisors, all Latina professionals themselves, will provide practical advice and personalized feedback to help you create a financial plan aligned with your goals and values. This workshop includes pre-work assessments, interactive live sessions, and 30 days of follow-up support to ensure you implement what you've learned.
events.shortDescription: Master your finances and build long-term wealth with strategies designed for Latina professionals.
